choices.C: errorInfo with the “In” direction result with the “Out” direction
choices.D: errorInfo with the “In” direction result with the “In/Out” direction
choices.B: errorInfo with the “Out” direction result with the “In/Out” direction
choices.A: errorInfo with the “In” direction result with the “In” direction

What is the default polling interval set for an event trigger?

discussion.content:
B. Polling interval
When you create a new connection and set up an event trigger on that connection, the polling interval is set by default to 5 minutes.
https://docs.uipath.com/integration-service/automation-cloud/latest/user-guide/triggers
